title: Leaverbuster because Game wouldn't Join

replies.body: You should only be getting LPQ punishments after the system starts to detect a history of being marked as AFK. It does kinda feel bad, but even disconnections can mark you as AFK if you're out of the game long enough. The system isn't smart enough to tell the difference between a force close quit or loss of connection, but regardless, both of those put your team at an unfair disadvantage which is the main point for getting punished in those situations.
I got a bug splat and am getting punished so i feel ya.  They need to reduce the leave buster time to 5 mins not damn 20 ridiculous minutes.
